Source.name: EBS Sensor: HCM PAY Duplicate Retro assignments with null Retro Assignment Action - Weekly
Source.DisplayName: EBS Sensor: HCM PAY Duplicate Retro assignments with null Retro Assignment Action - Weekly
Source.Description: Duplicate Retro assignments with retro_assignment_action_id is null identified.

DBPattern.SQLQuery: select 'ME$EBS_HCM_PAY_RETRO_ASG_STATUS_DUP_ISSUE' sensor, to_timestamp(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') entrytime, 'business_group_id:' || s.business_group_id || ', assignment_number:' || s.assignment_number || ', assignment_id:' || s.assignment_id || ', approval_status:' || s.approval_status || ', reprocess_date:' || s.reprocess_date key_data FROM (select papf.business_group_id business_group_id, assignment_number assignment_number, paaf.assignment_id assignment_id, pra.approval_status approval_status, pra.reprocess_date reprocess_date from apps.pay_retro_assignments pra, apps.per_all_assignments_f paaf, apps.per_all_people_f papf where pra.assignment_id = paaf.assignment_id and papf.person_id = paaf.person_id and pra.reprocess_date between paaf.effective_start_date and paaf.effective_end_date and pra.reprocess_date between papf.effective_start_date and papf.effective_end_date and exists ( select assignment_id, count(*) from apps.pay_retro_assignments where retro_assignment_action_id is null and assignment_id = paaf.assignment_id group by assignment_id having count(*) > 1 ) and rownum<100 order by 3) s
